ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Prepare for another nerf...
ygData.msgSnippet: Until I started playing other classes seriously, I did not fully appreciate the value of mana regen.  Now, I play a Cleric (52), an Enchanter (51 & 22), and a
ygData.messageBody:
Until I started playing other classes seriously, I did not fully appreciate
the value of mana regen. Now, I play a Cleric (52), an Enchanter (51 & 22),
and a Wizard (34) as much or more than my 53 bard. Mana regen without ench
or bard is simply unacceptable. Certain classes "add" to groups; other
classes "multiply" the effectiveness of the group. I don't see that as a
trivial function.

Sylly Songsynger
(The Pantheon)
Minstrel somewhere on Innoruuk...

p.s. new guild record time: PoH cleared in 3 hours (Innny was not up but
Maestro was.) Also, a random encouter with Faydwer (sp?) the Tim Deep
"dragon" proved fatal for the dragon.

-----Original Message-----
From: Mike Merck [mailto:mmerck@...]
Sent: Thursday, September 21, 2000 2:48 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Prepare for another nerf...

I think the problem is that most of us have already re-evaluated our
playlists and determined that in 95% off all balanced groups, the most
effective thing you can do is be a mana/hp battery. The Cantana/Nivs/Mana
song combo is so powerful, it's almost always the "best" thing you can do.
